dashboard.title: Microsoft Internet Information Services Application Pool

data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 85) AND (page_faults IS NULL OR page_faults < 0) AND (private_memory_usage IS NULL OR private_memory_usage < 85) AND (status IS NULL OR status = 'Started')) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool FACET microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool_name

presentation.title: Web Server Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Web Server of this Application Pool

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool_name) AS 'Application Pools' FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool FACET manage_runtime_version

presentation.title: Manage Runtime Version Distribution
presentation.notes: Specific version of .NET CLR that is loaded by application pool.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of CPU being used by application pool processes.

data.nrql: SELECT average(private_memory_usage) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Private Memory Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of system memory currently used as website process private bytes.

data.nrql: SELECT average(total_requests_rate) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Total Requests (Requests per Second)
presentation.notes: The number of requests that have been served since the application pool started.

data.nrql: SELECT average(io_operations) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: I/O Operations (Operations)
presentation.notes: The number of read and write operations performed by all application pool processes in the last second.

data.nrql: SELECT average(page_faults) FROM microsoft_internetinformationservices_application_pool COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Page Faults
presentation.notes: The number of page faults experienced by all application pool processes in the last second.
